General.Name: Shanghai CEO Environmental Protection Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai CEO Environmental Protection Technology Co., Ltd provides sludge dewatering and drying, and waste gas purification technology equipment in China. Its products include low-temperature vacuum dehydration and drying integrated technical equipment; and exhaust gas purification technologies and equipment, such as active oxygen ions, composites, biological filters, and molecular capture and catalytic oxidation equipment. The company is also involved in the provision of services for urban and industrial park sewage treatment plants; research and development, design, manufacturing, integration, installation, and service of energy-saving and environmental protection technology and equipment; operation and maintenance for sludge volume reduction; purification treatment of odorous pollutants and volatile organic pollutants; and pollution reduction activities. Shanghai CEO Environmental Protection Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 2011 and is based in Shanghai, China.
